tr_emailAddressDesc: Eita e nehenehe e taui i te vahi nohoiraa rata uira. Farerei mai ia matou mai te peu e te hinaaro ra oe e taui i te reira.
tr_theocraticAssignmentsField: Tuu i te vahi no te mau hora tiaraa i roto i ta'u parauraa
tr_theocraticAssignmentsFieldDesc: Hora i ravehia i roto i te mau haapiiraa e te mau natairaa teotaratia i fariihia (LDC, HLC, ohipa no te Betela, e te vai atu â)
tr_notificationPreferences: Mau hinaaro no te mau faaararaa
tr_notificationPreferencesDesc: Maiti eaha te mau faaararaa ta oe e ore e hinaaro e farii mai roto mai ia Organized. E nehenehe oe e taui i ta oe mau maitiraa i muri iho.
tr_reportReminderDesc: Farii i te mau haamana'oraa i te mahana hopea o te mau ava'e atoa, e mai te peu e mo'e ia oe, e farii oe i te tahi atu haamana'oraa i roto i te tahi mau mahana
tr_collabActivitiesDesc: Ia faaarahia oe no te mau ohipa e hinaarohia te tauturu, hi'oraa: ohipa aua aore ra faaineine i te piha no te haapiiraa aore ra tairururaa haaati
tr_myAssignmentsDesc: Ia faaara-oioi-hia oe no ta oe mau natairaa apî atoa
tr_infoBoardAnnouncements: Mau parau faaara apî o te tabula
tr_infoBoardAnnouncementsDesc: Ia tapohia, eita oe e farii i te mau faaararaa no te mau parau faaara apî, maori râ ia faaoti te mau matahiapo i te faaara i te amuiraa taatoa no te hoê mea faufaa
tr_partnerSearch: Porohia e imi ra i te hoa taviniraa
tr_partnerSearchDesc: Ia faaarahia oe i te taime iho e pia 'i te hoê taata i te aniraa no te hoa
tr_autoSyncDesc: Faatuati aunoa i te mau haamaramaramaraa i rotopu i te amuiraa e ta oe mau matini i tomohia i roto ia Organized
tr_customLinkInMobilePanel: Hono taa ê i roto i te pae faatereraa no te niuniu
tr_customLinkInMobilePanelDesc: Mono i te pitopito ‘Tabula faaararaa’ i te tahi atu ravea no te haere vitiviti atu mai te api Home
tr_autoThemeChange: Taui aunoa i te hoho'a o te app
tr_autoThemeChangeDesc: Pee i te faanahoraa o ta oe matini no te maiti i rotopu i te hoho'a maramarama e te poiri
tr_2FADesc: E haapuai te Haapapuraa tataipiti (2FA) i te parururaa o ta oe pute na roto i te aniraa i te hoê code parururaa hamanihia e ta oe app haapapuraa i nia i te niuniu.
tr_lockAppWithPIN: Puni i te app e te hoê PIN
tr_lockAppWithPINDesc: Ia ore e ohipa, e puni te app ma te aunoa no te paruru
tr_sessionsDesc: Te tabula o te mau matini tei tomo i roto i ta oe pute. Faaore i te mau tomoraa ta oe e ore e taa ra.
tr_logoutClearData: Haere i rapae e tumâ i te mau haamaramaramaraa i nia i te matini?
tr_logoutClearDataDesc: A haapapu e ua faatuatihia ta oe mau haamaramaramaraa apî, aita ana'e e tumâhia te reira.
tr_2FAEnableDesc: Faaohipa i te app Google Authenticator aore ra Microsoft Authenticator i nia i ta oe niuniu no te scan i te code QR e no te faahope i te faanahoraa.
tr_codeCopiedDesc: Pape i te reira i roto i ta oe app haapapuraa
tr_2FAEnabledDesc: E nehenehe oe e tapo i te 2FA i roto i te mau faanahoraa
tr_2FADisableDesc: E haamaitai te 2FA i ta oe parururaa, no reira e mea maitai ia vai faaoho noa. Haapapu mai te peu e te hinaaro ra oe e tapo.
tr_2FADisabledDesc: E nehenehe oe e faaoho faahou i roto i te mau faanahoraa
tr_PINCreateDesc: Hamani i te hoê PIN puai no te paruru maitai a'e. Eiaha e faaohipa i te mau code ohie roa.
tr_PINConfirmDesc: Haapapu i ta oe PIN no te faahope i te faanahoraa.
tr_PINNewSetDesc: E nehenehe oe e faaohipa i te reira no te iriti ia Organized
tr_2FAStep1: Taahiraa 1: Faanaho i te 2FA i nia i ta oe matini
tr_2FAStep1Desc: Faaohipa i te hoê o te mau ravea i raro nei no te taai i ta oe app haapapuraa. Ta matou a'oraa, a faaohipa ia Google Authenticator aore ra Microsoft Authenticator.
tr_2FAQuickSetupDesc: Mai te peu e te vai ra te tahi o te mau app haapapuraa i faahitihia i nia nei, faaohipa i teie pitopito no te faanaho vitiviti i te reira i nia i ta oe matini.
tr_2FAQRCodeDesc: Scan i te code QR e ta oe app haapapuraa no te faanaho i te Haapapuraa tataipiti.
tr_2FASetupKeyDesc: Pape i te taviri faanahoraa e tuu i te reira i roto i ta oe app haapapuraa no te faanaho i te Haapapuraa tataipiti.
tr_timeAwayDesc: Aita e taime maira i tuuhia'tura. Faatano noa i to oe taime maira ia nehenehe te mau taeae e haapao i te reira ia faanaho ratou i te mau putuputura'a no a muri a'e.
tr_terminatedDesc: Ua faaorehia te tomoraa i nia i tera matini
tr_deleteAccountDesc: Te hinaaro papu ra oe e tumâ i ta oe pute i roto ia Organized?
tr_deleteAccountWithCongregationDesc: Te hinaaro papu ra oe e tumâ i ta oe pute i roto ia Organized? E tumâ atoa teie ohipa i ta oe amuiraa no te mea o oe ana'e te taata faaohipa. Tuu i te taviri rahi o te amuiraa i raro nei no te haapapu i te tumâraa.
tr_deleteAccountAssignAdminFirst: Hou a tumâ ai i ta oe pute, a haapapu e ua faataa oe i te tahi atu taata faatere app no te tauturu i te mau taata faaohipa i roto i ta oe amuiraa.
